snippet.title: (SEASON 2) Sonic Infinity : Adventure Pack - SAGE 2020 Demo RELEASE Trailer
snippet.description:
#SAGE2020 #FUNKYACTIONGANG

Get a glimpse of the 2nd season of the Adventure Pack with the Abyssal Dungeon Experience. Experience the oddball of the pack like never before with a blend of remastered segments from season 1 and brand new areas exclusive to Season 2! 

This demo comes packed with a pause menu that includes the level & music description and several customizable settings (like HUD, POV Motion Blur) all with full gamepad support!
There is also Nvidea Ansel support which allows you to create some really dope screenshots, good for making some neat Youtube Thumbnails or photography in general.


The Abyssal Dungeon Experience: 
MEGA - https://mega.nz/file/oYNhSCBS#8zBJYDyd1sHuHpAw_vGl9XbnoXLCWbxWP2YGZ1F-5B4
Google Drive - https://drive.google.com/u/0/uc?id=1AXp4sCVZlJ9SDaOjgWFrWQYT0WZosaxD&export=download

The post-SAGE update is now in

Full Demo credits and etc. are in the SFGHQ booth:
https://www.sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/advpack-season-2-sage-demo.742/

If you're interested to see a glimpse of the Future of Adventure Pack, then check out this trailer as well! - https://youtu.be/rsl9mUq_Mck
